CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1962, pg. 21 reads: "Discussing UP "Spectacular" - Discussing some of the details of the "Spectacular" show, which kicked off the 1962 United Fund campaign, was the above foursome, during a press interview last Saturday at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton. The Gulf Oil Corporation coordinated the components of the kick-off TV show.  Left to right: Walt Harper, co-director of the All Star Big Band; Daniel G. (Dan) Kean of Gulf's public relations staff; Pittsburgh's own Erroll Garner, one of the stars of the show, and Ray Kohler, manager, special projects of the Gulf public relations staff. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Walt Harper, Daniel G. "Dan" Kean of Gulf Oil, Erroll Garner, and Roy Kohler of Gulf Oil public relations, seated in Penn Sheraton Hotel discussing the United Fund campaign "Spectacular" show
